mapper.delete: delete from follow where following_id = #{following_id} and follower_id = #{follower_id}
mapper.insert: insert into follow (follower_id, following_id, follow_date) values (#{follower_id}, #{following_id}, now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from follow a where exists(select * from follow b where b.following_id = #{following_id} and b.follower_id = #{follower_id})
